mapper.insert: INSERT into business_user (name, tel, id, pw, area, company_name, company_number) VALUES (#{name},#{tel},#{id},#{pw},#{area},#{companyName}, #{companyNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE business_user SET name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, id =#{id}, pw = #{pw}, area = #{area}, company_name = #{companyName}, company_number = #{companyNumber} where user_no = #{userNo}
